backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing portfolio data, exposing queries and mutations for projects, experiences, social links, and contact submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Machineâ€‘generated report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend React components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide detailing how to build, deploy, verify, and troubleshoot the React frontend on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing a light/dark OKLCH color system for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document containing the mounting point and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper providing theme support, data seeding, toast notifications, and rendering the Portfolio page.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Hero section displaying the user's profile, summary, and navigation buttons with animated visuals.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation, async submission via React Query, and social link icons.
Initializes portfolio data by fetching content, uploading a default profile image, and adding missing predefined projects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and a mobile menu.
Shows a grid of project cards including images, descriptions, and role details.
frontend/src/components/WorkExperienceSe: Renders a timeline-style list of work experiences with period, title, company, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for loading portfolio content and submitting contact forms via the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Initializes Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based CSS variables for light and dark themes with utility overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Renders the portfolio page with section tracking, loading and error states, and content sections populated from usePortfolioContent.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, radius, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and implemented features related to fixing loading behavior and redeployment.
